original_text: God will think about the words that you have spoken. Then he will decide whether to let you go free or to punish you.’
korean_text: 네 말로 의롭다 함을 받고 네 말로 정죄함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: God will think about the words that you have spoken.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신이 한 말을 생각하실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: whether to let you go free
